name: Do Unto Others (Norberto)
description:
Jesus managed to slip away from the roman guards by running over the river. But Pontius Pilate has an ace up his sleeve: his elite force of ninja scuba legionnaires.

Quarantine is making me lose my mind.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • J melee attack
  • K ranged attack

Sounds from:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/battle-sound-effects
  • https://opengameart.org/content/40-cc0-water-splash-slime-sfx

Sprites shamelessly copied from https://www.spriters-resource.com/xbox_360/scottpilgrimvstheworldthegame/
